org.apache.paimon.deletionvectors

Class BitmapDeletionVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.deletionvectors.BitmapDeletionVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeletionVector

    public class BitmapDeletionVector
extends Object
implements DeletionVector
    A DeletionVector based on RoaringBitmap32, it only supports files with row count not exceeding RoaringBitmap32.MAX_VALUE.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.paimon.deletionvectors.DeletionVector
